mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Eddington , William
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Newark, Licking Co., O [Newark, Licking County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Eddington , William Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right leg and gun shot flesh wound of left leg. Location Wounded: Cloyd Mountain. Date Wounded: 1864/05/09. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
